rules.description: Map caps_lock to control if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone
Left option + keys for better movement with mods

to.shell_command: PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m window --space 1 && PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m space --focus 1
PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m window --space 2 && PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m space --focus 2
PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m window --space 3 && PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m space --focus 3
PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m window --space 4 && PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m space --focus 4
PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m window --space 5 && PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m space --focus 5
PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m window --space 6 && PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m space --focus 6
PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m window --space 7 && PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m space --focus 7
PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m window --space 8 && PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m space --focus 8
PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m window --space 9 && PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m space --focus 9
PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m window --space 10 && PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m space --focus 10
PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m space --focus prev || PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m space --focus last
PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m space --focus next || PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m space --focus first
PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m window --space prev && PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m space --focus prev
PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m window --space next && PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m space --focus next
PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m window --focus next || PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m window --focus first
PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m window --swap next || PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m window --swap first
PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m window --warp next || PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m window --warp first
PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m window --focus prev || PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m window --focus last
PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m window --swap prev || PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m window --swap last
PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m window --warp prev || PATH='/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin' yabai -m window --warp last
